post:
50% OFF Coupon Code for all packages including recurring renewals, max use 1 per client. 

Expiry data is Dec 1, 2021.

Coupon Code

```
CIV1EF9OYXY
```

## Why choose V.PS?

- [V.PS](https://v.ps/ "V.PS") is part of [xTom](https://xtom.com/ "xTom"), an affordable colocation and IP transit provider since 2012.
- We own all enterprise hardware from Dell, HP & Samsung, network and IP space.
- In-house networking engineer and local staff in datacenter.
- 1Gbps and 10Gbps Network Connection w/ Premium Tier 1 Upstreams.
- 14-day money back guarantee

## Our KVM VPS features:

- Dual E5v3/v4 Processors
- Enterprise SSDs in Hardware RAID-10
- KVM Virtualization on Proxmox VE
- BGP Sessions, DE-CIX DUS and LocIX Ports Available (Düsseldorf and Frankfurt)
- Reverse DNS (PTR) configuration on client area

### KVM VPS Plans

#### Starter

```
- 1GB RAM
- 2x vCPU
- 20GB SSD space
- 1TB transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- 1x IPv6
- KVM/Proxmox
- €2.98/month w/ coupon code CIV1EF9OYXY
- €28.09/year w/ coupon code CIV1EF9OYXY
```
